
<!--
Parameters:

title, htmlTable, id, latexTable

-->
<div class="mlPlot">

    <center><h2>{{title}}</h2></center>
    <center>From experiment: <a href="#{{context}}">{{context}}</a></center>
    </br>
    </br>

    <center>
    <img  src="./img/{{id}}.svg" width="100%"/>
    </center>

    </br>
    </br>
        Download
        <select id="{{id}}_download">
            <option value=".eps">EPS</option>
            <option value=".pdf">PDF</option>
            <option value=".png">PNG</option>
            <option value=".svg">SVG</option>
        </select>
        <input type="button" value="Get File" onclick="
            var name = './img/{{id}}';
            var ext = document.getElementById('{{id}}_download').value;
            window.open(name.concat(ext));"
        /> 
    
    </br>
    </br>
    <hr>
    </br>
    </br>
</div>
